top_comments.comment: Most of this list is still more stylish than 'trendy items'. Trends come and go, classic staples stay around for a long time
I love how he insist first every one to try one and later on next video boom it's out of fashion z😂
Every trend that he recommended in the past few years, and now he's redacting them all 🤦🏻‍♂️

comments_since_last_sample.body: At this point every man wears an underwear… we better change what we wear now!
Might have to disagree with every one of these 🤷‍♂ except number 6 🙌😂

Next year it’ll be we need to stop wearing puffer jackets. “My guy you just look like a marshmallow and honestly you just look kind of ridiculous walking around like the Michelin tire man.” Throw in another comment about how we need to switch to something with a sleeker silhouette for a more timeless aesthetic and I’d say you got next year’s script in the can 🤣🤣🤣
Bro I give zero f**** what you tell me to wear I wear what I wanna wear

This really should be called something along the lines of "6 Things Out of Trend" or "Swap These 6 Overdone Items to Stand Out" because certain items are always on point for good style. Chelsea boots are definitely one of those things, like good proper-fitting jeans. The suggestions are great to set one apart and mix up what everyone else is doing, but trend-jumping isn't core style. Except for men's jeggings--ahem--tight joggers. Those just need to go and never should have been lol
Petition to add shearling jackets and coats, both denim and suede, to the list.
Whose this guy saying how people should dress. He isn’t put together a lot of the times. Maybe he needs to take his own advice.
Most of this list is still more stylish than 'trendy items'. Trends come and go, classic staples stay around for a long time
